by: Design and development of strategic websites and web applications that drive growth, improve user experience and bring value to the digital products of the moment!
descripcionQuienSoy: I am a web developer who is just starting in the programming world with a strong passion for technology and video games. Although I've been here for a short time, I strive to learn every day and apply good practices from the beginning.
descripcionMiEnfoque: I am focused on building clean, functional, fast and meaningful solutions. Programming is something that goes beyond the code, you have to think about the user experience, the clarity of the design and the logic of the project.
descripcionMiObjetivo: To become a professional developer capable of adding value to any team, working with passion, perseverance and always with a vision for the future.
descripcionHabilidades: These are the skills I have and the languages I use in programming.
descripcionContacto: You can contact me via Discord or by using the form below.
errorEnvio: There was an error sending the message. Please try again.
contacto_message: If you're interested in being the first of many projects, don't hesitate to contact me.
